author: Nigel Slater
method: Combine all ingredients (except the raisins and hazelnuts) in a pan and warm up very slowly, never allowing it to boil.  Place two tablespoons each of raisins and hazelnuts into each glass and ladle in the glögg.
ingredients: 1 bottle of red wine,  100g/3½oz demerara sugar,  1 tbsp honey,  1 vanilla pod, seeds scraped out,  2 cinnamon sticks,  1 tsp cloves,  raisins,  crushed hazelnuts
